Posts.Content: How did it turn out? I am in a similar situation currently. I had a fibrosis lump removed when I was 18 on my left breast and now I am 46 and they see a dark spot on my right one. I am going in for a second more in depth test on Tuesday as well as an ultrasound.
Posts.Title: Need a second mammogram

Posts.Content: kate222 Thanks. I am glad you had good results. I did not sleep well last night thinking about it. I know I shouldn't worry yet. My two test are on Friday and I am sure I will not get results until middle of next week. Long wait when you worry. I am going to stay positive! Again Thanks
